mapper.update: update document set DOCUMENT_TYPE_ID = #{documentTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE_CREATED = #{dateCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, COMMENTS = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCUMENT_LOCATION = #{documentLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOCUMENT_TEXT = #{documentText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATED_STAMP = #{lastUpdatedStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATED_TX_STAMP = #{lastUpdatedTxStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_STAMP = #{createdStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_TX_STAMP = #{createdTxStamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IMAGE_DATA = #{imageData,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select DOCUMENT_ID, DOCUMENT_TYPE_ID, DATE_CREATED, COMMENTS, DOCUMENT_LOCATION, DOCUMENT_TEXT, LAST_UPDATED_STAMP, LAST_UPDATED_TX_STAMP, CREATED_STAMP, CREATED_TX_STAMP, IMAGE_DATA from document where DOCUMENT_ID = #{documentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select DOCUMENT_ID, DOCUMENT_TYPE_ID, DATE_CREATED, COMMENTS, DOCUMENT_LOCATION, DOCUMENT_TEXT, LAST_UPDATED_STAMP, LAST_UPDATED_TX_STAMP, CREATED_STAMP, CREATED_TX_STAMP, IMAGE_DATA from document
